articles.title: DoorDash says it banned driver who seemingly faked a delivery using AI
articles.description: DoorDash seems to have confirmed a viral story about a driver using an AI-generated photo to lie about making a delivery.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: French and Malaysian authorities are investigating Grok for generating sexualized deepfakes
articles.description: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Plaud launches a new AI pin and a desktop meeting notetaker

articles.title: Subtle releases ear buds with its noise isolation models
articles.description: Subtle's new $199 earbuds will also let you dictate in any app on desktop or phone
